body_html:
Rather than this:

from tensorflow.data import TFRecordDataset

Please do this:

# Option 1
import tensorflow as tf
tf.data.TFRecordDataset(...)

# Option 2
import tensorflow as tf
TFRecordDataset = tf.data.TFRecordDataset
TFRecordDataset(...)

# Option 3 (not subject to API stability promise)
from tensorflow.python.data.ops import readers
readers.TFRecordDataset(...)
body_text:
Rather than this:
from tensorflow.data import TFRecordDataset
Please do this:
# Option 1
import tensorflow as tf
tf.data.TFRecordDataset(...)

# Option 2
import tensorflow as tf
TFRecordDataset = tf.data.TFRecordDataset
TFRecordDataset(...)

# Option 3 (not subject to API stability promise)
from tensorflow.python.data.ops import readers
readers.TFRecordDataset(...)
body:
Rather than this:

```py
from tensorflow.data import TFRecordDataset
```

Please do this:

```py
# Option 1
import tensorflow as tf
tf.data.TFRecordDataset(...)

# Option 2
import tensorflow as tf
TFRecordDataset = tf.data.TFRecordDataset
TFRecordDataset(...)

# Option 3 (not subject to API stability promise)
from tensorflow.python.data.ops import readers
readers.TFRecordDataset(...)
```
